Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

Transferring audiences between ad accounts isn't directly supported on NewsBreak. However, you can create custom audiences by uploading a CSV file containing user identifiers such as email addresses or device IDs to generate a custom audience segment for each ad account. For more details, check out the Audience Management guide here: [Introduction to Audience Management](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/26679465558669-Introduction-to-Audience-Management).
